AND R.FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe#
AND R.FLAW_RPR_NM LIKE '%' || #sFlawRprNm# || '%'

AND ( R.FLAW_EXAM_DT >= #sFlawRprStartDtFr#

)
ORDER BY R.FLAW_RPR_START_DT DESC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
